module O: sig
  val (=): bool -> bool -> bool
  val (<>): bool -> bool -> bool
  val (<): bool -> bool -> bool
  val (<=): bool -> bool -> bool
  val (>): bool -> bool -> bool
  val (>=): bool -> bool -> bool
  val not: bool -> bool
  val (&&): bool -> bool -> bool
  val (||): bool -> bool -> bool
  val xor: bool -> bool -> bool
end
